text: Hiroshi Fukushima (born 14 July 1982) is a former association football player. He played for V-Varen Nagasaki. He also played several seasons for Avispa Fukuoka in the J1 League. ==Club statistics== Club performance Club performance Club performance League League Cup Cup League Cup League Cup Total Total Season Club League Apps Goals Apps Goals Apps Goals Apps Goals Japan Japan Japan League League Emperor's Cup Emperor's Cup J.League Cup J.League Cup Total Total 2001 Avispa Fukuoka J1 League 0 0 0 0 0 0 0 0 2002 J2 League 8 0 1 0 - 9 0 2003 30 8 1 0 - 31 8 2004 19 1 0 0 - 19 1 2005 2 0 1 0 - 3 0 2005 Rosso Kumamoto Regional Leagues 0 0 0 0 - 0 0 2006 Football League 23 5 3 4 - 26 9 2007 V-Varen Nagasaki Regional Leagues 7 4 2 0 - 9 4 2008 18 25 - - 18 25 2009 Football League 21 6 2 0 - 23 6 2010 16 2 1 0 - 17 2 2011 Kamatamare Sanuki Football League 23 8 1 0 - 24 8 Career total Career total Career total 167 59 12 4 0 0 179 63 ==References== Category:1982 births Category:Living people Category:Footballers from Aichi Prefecture
